description: Microsoft Excel no longer supports the XLTHTML format. Instead of saving documents as XLTHTML files, Excel supports saving them as .MHTML and .MHT files, which are more widely supported by web browsers.

To create a webpage version of your template in Excel 365, select File â†’ Save As , then choose the "Single File Web Page (*.mht, *.mhtml)" option from the dropdown menu. You can also choose to save the template as an .HTM or .HTML file.
